rv - a .ps site is not reliable for the purpose of this article, any more than a .ie site saying the Rep of Ireland controls all 32 counties would be; there's only 94 countries anyway
Rv. I disagree on all 3 counts: .gov sites are RS by default, the state has indeed been declared, and the level of recognition of the state is important,
1) pna.gov.ps is hardly a RS. 2) There is no state, only a proposition. 3) Number of countries supporting this proposition is not relevant for the lead of this article.
